configuration.title: KSP Compiler
configuration.python.location: Location of python executable. Default is "python" (Search from $PATH variable)
configuration.compiler.script: Path to the KSP compiler python script
configuration.compiler.date: Add current date comment at the beginning of compiled file
configuration.validate.delay: Delay time to start validation in milliseconds. Set it to 0 to disable realtime checking.
command.compile: NI KSP: Run Compiler & copy script to clipboard
